ProductInfo.Features:
16 Channel Real-time D1 Resolution DVR wtih Advanced H.264 compression and Motion Detection
16 Weatherproof Cameras with 600TV Lines of Resolution, and 120 ft of Night Vision
Remote Internet Monitoring via Mac or PC (up to 10 simultaneous users)
View the action on your smart phone! Compatible with iPhone, iPad, BlackBerry, Android, and Symbian using the free "SuperCam" or "QT View" apps available at your app store.
Receive instant email alerts and snapshot images when motion is detected to up to 3 email adresses
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See® Business Class 16-Channel H.264 1TB (1000GB) DVR Security System with 16 600TVL IR cameras
